description:
The law office of David W. Saba Esq., Attorney at Law, is proud to provide comprehensive legal services to the people of Kingston, Pennsylvania. The firm offers legal representation to those who need help in the following areas: personal injury, business law, real estate law, estate planning and workers' compensation.

Within the personal injury section of the firm, the following types of cases are managed: motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, construction accidents, trucking accidents, animal bites, nursing home abuse and wrongful death. The estate planning side of the firm manages cases of estate law, probate, trusts and wills. On the business side, the firm handles cases related to business organization, contracts, labor, land use and zoning, litigation and appeals, real estate, and wage and hour laws.

When clients choose the law office of David W. Saba Esq., Attorney at Law, they gain access to an attorney who is smart, hardworking aggressive, highly credentialed and experienced. The firm's attorney has more than four decades of experience, virtual appointments are offered, and arrangements can be made for credit card payments when necessary. The firm's attorney is also certified by the National Board of Legal Specialty Certification in civil trial and pretrial advocacy.

The people at the law office are proud to help those who need legal representation at times that can often be complex and confusing. The best results do not always come from a big firm, and the friendly atmosphere the office offers creates an environment where clients feel comfortable discussing personal, sensitive matters with a legal professional.
